text: ROC FACIAL RECOGNITION. Is your system powered by the industry s fastest and most accurate solution? THE ROC SDK A lightweight software development kit that gives system and device integrators access to the world s most versatile face recognition technology. ACCURATE 2x MORE ACCURATE ON WILD 2x MORE ACCURATE ON MUGSHOTS FAST 2x FASTER ENROLLMENT SPEED 13x FASTER COMPARISON SPEED COMPACT SMALLEST TEMPLATE AND BINARY SIZE IN THE INDUSTRY USABLE BEST IN CLASS API WITH EASY SOFTWARE INTEGRATION. INDUSTRY LEADING ACCURACY World leader in accurate facial recognition algorithms, as measured by the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). Photo ID (Visa) 99.6%, Controlled Capture (Mugshot) 99.2%, Social Media (Wild) 95.8%. UNRIVALED SPEED Fastest enrollment speed Fastest comparison speed Best option for video processing Reduced server needs. UNPARALLELED EFFICIENCY Smallest template size Smallest binary footprint Best option for mobile environments. EASY TO INTEGRATE The ROC SDK is a lightweight, simply integrated software library that enables rapid system development. Android macOS & iOS Linux Windows. ROC SDK FEATURES Verification Perform 1:1 verification with industry leading accuracy. Identification Search millions of faces on a mobile device, or billions on a server, in seconds. Face Detection Locate faces in photos and video with industry leading detection speed. Landmark Detection Track eye and chin locations. Clustering Group unlabeled faces by identity. Face Quality Metric Predict a face likelihood to generate a successful match. Face Analytics Analyze a face to predict its age, ethnicity and gender. Emotion Analysis Analyze a face for anger, disgust, fear, joy, neutral, sadness or surprise expressions. Video Support Process videos in real-time using a single core on a mobile device or server. Pose Determine where a person is looking relative to the camera using roll, yaw and pitch measurements. Liveness Detect print and digital screen replay attacks using a single image. Person Counting Count persons in a video stream seamlessly. Homomorphic Encrypted Matching Measure template similarity within the encrypted domain. Glasses Detect eyeglasses, sunglasses, or no glasses. GPU Support Optionally enroll images on a GPU. Artwork Analysis Determine if a face is of a cartoon, a painting or a human. Fully Native Solution No internet connection is required. C API Wrappers Support for all major programming languages including Python, Java, C  and Go. Command Line Interface A robust command line interface allows constructing systems from shell scripts. TRUSTED BY 6 U.S. DEPT. OF DEFENSE AGENCIES 20+ LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCIES 5+ FORTUNE 500 FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS 1 of 2 MAJOR GLOBAL CREDIT CARD COMPANIES 10M+ FACIAL VERIFICATIONS PER YEAR. CONSUMER ELECTRONICSOn-edge face recognition enabling smart devices One and a half billion mobile phones were added to the marketplace last year. The number of smart consumer electronics, ranging from thermostats to refrigerators to televisions, is growing rapidly. The Internet of Things is at our doorstep, and consumers now expect their devices to know when we are present and interact accordingly. Never has the need for efficient software design been higher than in the world of mobile and embedded devices. Rank One is the industry leader in efficient face recognition software for mobile and embedded devices. Device Unlock, Personalization. Benefits Enables contactless device unlock Provides enterprise grade face recognition on mobile Offers seamless personalization. FINTECHKnow your customer to minimize risk and remain compliant Consumers are increasingly rejecting the notion of going to a brick and mortar bank to perform transactions. As banking and other enterprise operations shift further into the digital realm, the need for more comprehensive online identity verification has increased. Both via direct licensing and through our partners who provide packaged identity services, Rank One supports numerous institutions that provide identity verification services to the banking and financial industry, where our high accuracy, frictionless anti-spoof algorithm, and small binary footprint make Rank One uniquely suited for mobile app deployment. ID Proofing, Deduplication, Multi-factor Authentication. Benefits Validate IDs seamlessly Comply with financial regulations Detect fraudulent accounts Prevent fraudulent transactions. GOVERMENT & MILITARYSecure Borders, Protect Assets, Ensure Subsidies Governments around the world have wide ranging missions that aim to improve and empower the lives of their citizens. Whether this is through homeland security, or delivering subsidies to the impoverished, ascertaining the identity of a person is critical to nearly every government agency s mission. Rank One works with government and military customers to leverage facial recognition to protect sensitive sites, control access in key locations, and handle a variety of identity needs and verifications. Benefits Increase security at checkpoints and buildings Issue ID cards, passports, and visas without fraud Control access to sensitive systems Perform on-edge face recognition (mobile or embedded device). Identity Deduplication, Face Recognition at a Distance, Real-time Screening, Access Control, Identity Proofing, Open Source Screening. HEALTHCAREStreamline the healthcare process to increase security and prevent patient misdiagnosis First world countries spend 10% to 20% of their GDP on medical care. Biometric technologies can reduce patient misidentification incidences and help streamline medical care thereby lowering its cost. The facial biometric is ideal in the medical sector given its low degree of required cooperation (critical for handicapped patients) and contactless nature (critical for preventing disease transmission). The ROC SDK assists in the shift to mobile devices for patient management, as large-scale on-device search can be performed instantaneously and without any network connectivity. Benefits Prevent patient misidentification Reduce insurance fraud Improve operational workflows Reduce communicable disease Reduce operational costs. Identity Verification, Access Control, Two-factor Authentication. LAW ENFORCEMENTBuild investigative leads and reduce crime All too often an egregious crime occurs and nothing is available to identify the perpetrator except a surveillance image. Whether it is physical or sexual violence, exploitation of the elderly, stolen credit cards, or countless other offenses that adversely impact society, automated face recognition is often the best resource available to help solve the crime. Rank One knows the use of face recognition technology in law enforcement is a sensitive issue. We all are often reminded of the rise in authoritarian states, or biases in the U.S. criminal justice system, and Rank One is mindful of law enforcement s difficult task in walking the line between saving lives and harming them. Our team has been involved in critical concerns around best practices in forensic facial identification for the last decade. We have worked alongside cutting-edge local law enforcement agencies, as well as federal agencies tasked with incorporating automated facial recognition capabilities for the first time. Our executives published the first scientific article that ushered in awareness of the mis-balances in accuracy between different races, genders, and age groups. We have worked alongside facial examiners and those who develop facial examiner training programs. We have advised the FBI on how their technology could be improved in the aftermath of the Boston Marathon Bombings. Rank One is highly selective of who we support and it is uplifting to learn about the lives we have helped with our technology. Benefits Generate investigative leads Rapidly verify unknown identities Perform identification from a mobile device while on patrol. Forensic Search, Mobile Identification, Bodycam, Sensitive Site Exploitation. RETAILUnderstand your customers and their buying patterns to improve efficiency and grow the bottom line The ROC SDK provides a non-intrusive and accurate means to detect the age, emotion, gender, and race of a person. These facial analytics enable retailers and restaurants to better understand their customers to help deliver more tailored marketing messages and promotions. Facial recognition can further enable customer reward programs and deter shoplifters. Benefits Better understand your customer base Detect and deter shoplifting Customize and personalize promotions Boost customer loyalty Analyze marketing campaigns more effectively to determine ROI. Facial Analytics, Fraud Prevention, Person Counting, VIP Recognition, Staff Control. SECURITYKnow who is present on your property and minimize risk Residents wish to know when strangers approach their home. Event staff need to know who is permitted entrance. Business owners need to protect their assets. Face recognition has a role in addressing these concerns by providing a virtual security guard or significantly enhancing the effectiveness of an existing security officer. The ROC SDK provides an effective and affordable approach for 24/7 security. Our algorithms are also purposefully designed to handle the challenges of unconstrained environments present in security, including inconsistent illumination, off-angle faces, and other confounding factors. Benefits Monitor property and assets Screen security cameras in real-time Instantly recognize banned personnel and VIPs Expedite entry into events. Real-time Screening, Forensic Analysis, Access Control, Ticketing. ENGINEERED IN COLORADO. Our Mission To make the world safer and more convenient through the use of cutting-edge artificial intelligence algorithms that can accurately perform facial recognition. Our Story Founded by a team of engineers, we provide one of the most accurate and efficient face recognition solutions on the market. Through a wide range of licensing partnerships our technology helps consumers better protect their assets with fast and reliable authentication methods, and keep communities safe from violent criminals and national security threats. We also strive to be educators of how to best integrate face recognition algorithm, and promote the use of facial recognition technology in an ethical manner. Why Choose Us? Engineering First Approach Decades of Experience in Biometrics Developed in the USA Readily Available Support Team Constant Innovation Passion for Efficiency. Charity We donate a fixed percentage of our profits to charitable causes that are making a difference in our community and beyond. Here is a list of the organizations Rank One has helped support. Publications Our team s background in automated face recognition algorithms began with academic research. The following list of publications contains research our employees conducted in coordination with other colleagues, collaborators, and mentors.

text: What if you could pay with just a selfie? Saffe is a mobile payment app that leverages world-class facial recognition technology to make your life easier and more secure. Saffe is being built out of passion and purpose of its founders Andr√© Coelho and Giovani Chiachia. Andr√© has over seven years of experience in the financial market and has held positions such as broker and advisor of investments and M&A operations. He believes that life can be much easier with the use of technology and found in Saffe the ideal financial service to pursue such belief. Giovani is an experienced computer scientist with a background ranging from IT management to top-notch computer vision research. Through his MsC and PhD, he has been researching automatic face recognition over the past eight years. Lately he has crafted such technology for an unprecedented experience in mobile payments with the very same purpose of improving people s lives in daily tasks.

Website & Enterprise Portal Development Samtech is positioned to deliver portal solutions of a wide variety of types, scope and complexity. And whatever the underlying scenario, we assure delivery of a dynamic experience your customers, partners and employees are instinctively looking for. PRODUCT. FACE RECOGNITION SOFTWARE FACECHK Face Recognition deals with the identification and verification of a person from a digital image or from a video source. It can determine the unknown identity of human being on the basis of the facial characteristics and features derived from the digital image of that person. It is an artificial intelligence based system which perceive and learn contents of the image like human and perform search based on it FaceChk is an Artificial Intelligence based system which is capable of searching faces in a given set of database with high accuracy. The software has been benchmarked on Labelled Faces in the Wild (LFW) benchmark database, which consists of over 13,000 images of the faces collected from the web. Each face has been labeled with the name of the person pictured among which 1680 of the people pictured have two or more distinct photos in the data set. FaceChk Software has achieved 98% accuracy on this database. IMAGE COMPRESSION SOFTWARE ICOM. BUSINESS PROCESS MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE. text: Compliant Identity. Complete Integrity. Scanovate is the leading Enterprise Identity and Compliance platform for all organizations who need to ensure the identity of their customer or citizen users is authenticated with complete integrity. Imaging Solutions for the Mobile Age Scanovate harnesses the power of mobile imaging to help business achieve more for their clients and themselves. Powered by unique, secure, and disruptive technology, Scanovate provides imaging solutions for the mobile age, enhancing user experience by enabling mobile device users to save valuable time and money, thereby forging a stronger bond with their service providers. Scanovate changes the way business and clients interact, upgrading B2C interaction to unprecedented levels. BankScan: Leading Mobile Banking into the 22nd Century. BankScan is a mobile imaging toolkit designed to answer the specific needs and challenges facing banks in the mobile service age. As users increasingly rely on mobile channels as the main source of access to everyday banking services, the need for a fast, secure and simple interaction method is greater than ever. Banks must find ways to simplify and streamline complicated and labor intensive processes in order to retain clients and stay relevant, while simultaneously maintaining service security and regulatory compliance. Balancing client expectations and operational requirements calls for a solution of a new kind ‚Äì Scanovate is that solution. As users increasingly rely on mobile channels as the main source of access to everyday banking services, the need for a fast, secure and simple interaction method is greater than ever. Banks must find ways to simplify and streamline complicated and labor intensive processes in order to retain clients and stay relevant, while simultaneously maintaining service security and regulatory compliance. Balancing client expectations and operational requirements calls for a solution of a new kind ‚Äì Scanovate is that solution. TeleScan: Monetizing Mobile Devices Into Revenue Channels. TeleScan offers operators and carriers the tools they need in order to facilitate the creation of new revenue generating products. Scanovate streamlines the subscriber service experience while conferring on MNOs numerous benefits, including: an improved client acquisition and sales cycle process, increased digital service channel usage, and generating new VAS and revenue channels by addressing the shift of subscriber behavior to data driven services.  InsurScan: Client Satisfaction via Frictionless Mobile Engagement. InsurScan utilizes Scanovate s unique technology to take insurance companies mobile. As digital and mobile channels change the way people select and purchase insurance, user and service experience has taken on a new dimension. This has required insurance providers to implement new ways to engage and serve their client base. To do this effectively, insurance providers must find a way to overcome the industry s dependence on physical documentation. This dependency impedes mobile engagement by making it complicated and labor intensive for both the client and the service provider. Scanovate helps insurance companies bridge the paper gap that lies between them and the mobile age; seamlessly taking their client experience to the next level. TranScan: Mobilizing Mobile Money with regulatory compliance. TranScan offers banks and financial institutions with the ability to tap the soon-to-be 400 million mobile money transfer users. Transferring money locally and internationally should be a quick and simple procedure ‚Äì and with Scanovate, it is. By simplifying client registration and validation, enabling easier methods of bill payments, and lowering data dependency in payment processing, the money transfer process is made more consumer friendly. By improving data collection and service inclusion and supplying cross platform and device support, Scanovate provides an efficient alternative to banks and financial institutions in developing and developed countries. Scanovate provides the tools to facilitate the enormous number of money transfer transactions for those without a bank account and unsophisticated account holders. The African mobile money market is anticipated to reach $14.27 billion by 2020 with mobile payments and In India predicted to grow 200 times to $3 trillion over the next 7 years. GameScan: Service Compliance in a Snap. GameScan simultaneously provides gaming companies with the tools they need. Meet player service expectations greenbullet Comply with new AML and KYC regulations greenbullet Improve player engagement greenbullet Generate greater conversion via mobile and digital sales channels. GameScan simultaneously provides gaming companies with the tools they need in order to acquire and service players with the best possible gaming and registration experience. GameScan tools enable gaming companies to maintain the highest level of auditable service compliance. Self service SELF SERVICE Users perform and engage directly from their mobile device, improving user experience and reducing service costs Mobile onboarding MOBILE ONBOARDING Fast and simple registration process using traditional channels, without human input errors and process dropouts Content verification CONTENT VERIFICATION Integrated adherence, adaptation, and output for regulatory compliance when dealing with document driven mobile procedures Mobile deposit MOBILE DEPOSIT Facilitates quick and intuitive deposits of non-cash paper deposits directly from a mobile device Mobile registration MOBILE REGISTRATION Fast and simple registration utilizing data extracted from embedded documents ensures high data accuracy and improved service Agent assist application AGENT ASSIST APPLICATION Enables quick and accurate execution of complex document driven processes by inexperienced agents. Fast and simple integration. Zero data security impact. Increased Conversion via Mobile Channels. Scalable Performance. Maintain compliance. Higher conversion rates. Seamless & Frictionless KYC. ID card scanning, bill scanning, Full KYC solution, passport scanning, biometric verification, credit card scanning. FlightScan: Change how airlines and clients interact. FlightScan ‚Äì Scanovate s imaging platform for airlines and airports facilitates direct client to service provider frictionless communication. Providing clients with a frictionless service experience greenbullet Enabling fast and direct interaction greenbullet Adhering to regional and international regulations and security requirements. FlightScan ‚Äì Scanovate s imaging platform for airlines and airports facilitates direct client to service provider frictionless communication, enabling clients to do more in less time while maintaining great user experience. Scanovate s cross-platform and cross-borders solution changes the way clients interact with the aviation industry. Mobile onboarding, content verification, biometric validation, agent assist application, mobile deposite, full kyc, mobile payment.  KYCScan: Know Your Clients, Scan & Comply. When combined with our network of leading third-party data scoring partners and new biometric capabilities, KYCScan tool kit empowers service provider. Technology. Scanovate s client-side mobile imaging platform delivers optimized, scalable, frictionless B2C interaction ‚Äì anywhere, anytime. Adapting to the ever-changing regulatory landscape greenbullet Maintaining high service levels greenbullet Maintaining service compliance in multiple regions and countries. When combined with our network of leading third-party data scoring partners and new biometric capabilities, the KYCScan tool kit empowers service providers by enabling them to provide clients with a fast and frictionless service experience while maintaining the highest level of regulatory compliance. The platform offers: Plug and play integration No server dependency Volume agnosticism No data dependency Native OS support Over-the-air updates Fully customizable UI Adaptive architecture. About Mission statement Scanovate s unique technology empowers businesses and their clients by providing the platform for clients to streamline a variety of capabilities directly from their business mobile application; transforming previously labor intensive and time-consuming processes into fast, simple, secure, and intuitive tasks. By automatically identifying, collecting, and digitally embedding all necessary process completion data in real time from documents with any camera enabled smart device, user experience is refined; resulting in improved frictionless client interaction and satisfaction. Facilitating Business / Client Mobile Interaction with Cutting Edge Technology. Using image processing and machine learning infrastructure to deliver a new and revolutionary mobile imaging platform that combines seamlessly with any business application and process. Adaptive neural network architecture Case based document validation No security signature No infrastructure needed Integration friendly design Machine learning infrastructure High precision Full usage scalability. Multiple solutions using mobile OCR. Bringing the Customer Journey into the Mobile Age. Mission Statement Mobile devices have become ubiquitous and most consumers interact with it more than with any other technology. Scanovate seeks to reinvent customer journeys by bringing a mobile mindset to the most common financial transactions; expediting processes and making them user friendly. Using innovation to change the face of service and engagement, Scanovate seeks to change the way people interact with documents by automating cumbersome tasks and advancing paperless transactions. By making "mobile first" a state of mind and augmenting this with ease of use and transaction security, Scanovate s technology will unleash the full power of the Mobile Age. Who we are: Established in 2014, Scanovate was founded by serial entrepreneurs utilizing and adapting state-of-the-art technology to optimize select business/ client interactions. Scanovate is a part of the Fishman Holdings Group. Out-of-the-box thinking coupled with diverse yet complementary academic knowledge, real world experience, and augmented education at the Citi Accelerator for Fintech companies, resulted in the development of Scanovate s unique suite of products. Scanovate s products bridge the chasm between physical documentation and digital services, changing the way business and customers interact. Core Values: Innovation, agility, mobile first, building solutions that adapt, technology as a method not a goal.

text: SINA: Secure Inter-Network Architecture. SINA - For the Highest IT Security Requirements One of the centrepieces of the secunet portfolio is SINA (Secure Inter-Network Architecture), a high-security solution that secunet developed on behalf of the German Federal Office for Information Security (BSI). SINA is mainly used by clients of secunet s Public Authorities, Homeland Security and Defence divisions, and has taken on an increasingly important role in the Critical Infrastructures division. SINA products are used for the secure processing, storage, transmission and verification of classified and other sensitive information. The system works by strictly separating differently classified data. SINA solutions are scalable, designed for complex national, international and multinational infrastructures, and suitable formass roll-outs. The extensive product range - from tablets and other clients, through crypto gateways to Ethernet encoders - can be deployed in a wide range of application scenarios. Thanks to SINA Management, the individual SINA components can be flexibly configured, allowing the customer to retain sovereignty over cryptography and key management at all times. SINA is the only IP-based cryptographic system that is approved by the German Federal Office for Information Security up to security classification German SECRET, as well as for the international NATO SECRET and SECRET UE/EU SECRET levels. National and international authorities, the armed forces, and private companies which are subject to the German Federal Ministry of Economic Affairs and Energy s secret protection programme have successfully used SINA for many years. With nearly 100,000 installations in over 30 countries worldwide, the numbers speak for themselves. PKI: Public-Key-Infrastructures. secunet security infrastructure ‚Äì crucial for critical networks An ecosystem for secure networking and separation of critical networks. The aim is to isolate separated networks across sites and connect them to the "outside world" ‚Äì manufacturers, service providers, project partners ‚Äì via secure gateways and quarantine systems. At the same time, the established perimeter and protection devices in the network can be monitored intelligently and automatically in real time. The services provided by the secunet security infrastructure are based on generally applicable technical security architectures that are universally implemented in various industries. Both classic IT and industrial networks are served with appropriate individual characteristics. Biometrics: secunet is among the leading biometrics experts not only in Germany. For us, biometrics is far from being just another trending topic. Instead, we have been significantly involved in the successful implementation of biometric key projects in Europe for almost 20 years. We deal with the biometric registration and verification in the context of official identity documents as well as for the identity check and verification of persons, border control and passenger flow optimisation - from research, evaluation, piloting and product development to realisation. We are profoundly versatile when it comes to biometrics: Investments in long-term partnerships Cooperation on technical guidelines and standards Standard-compliant IT solutions and products Comprehensive consulting for future-proof solutions Research with consistent practical relevance. In close cooperation with the Federal Office for Information Security (BSI), we develop standard-compliant products and IT solutions which have been internationally recognised as reference implementation. For example, the secunet biomiddle platform: As core component of many eID and biometrics applications, the middleware, takes over the flexible integration of the application-specific processes and controls the required software and hardware components via standard interfaces. secunet continuously supports and impacts the newest developments and technologies through an extensive network and active participation in international work groups. Our experts have contributed to over 50 technical guidelines and ISO standards in the area of biometrics and eIDs. As part of a transatlantic team, we are currently refining the NFIQ2 algorithm for the assessment of the quality of fingerprints.  Our holistic, standard-compliant products and IT solutions are used thousands of times every day. They simplify the registration and verification process of electronic and biometric identities and ensure the highest degree of security. We advise our customers about suitable and future-proof biometric modalities and protection mechanisms as well as about measures for handling sensitive biometric data. In doing so, we ensure that processes and solutions are aligned with the respective legal framework conditions, for example regarding data protection, and that such conditions are observed. Our experts continuously research even more secure processes for practical use. We deal with current, relevant questions: How must biometric algorithms and processes be designed so that the registered data do not allow for conclusions about a single person - even if the data should fall into unauthorised hands? Or how can we use artificial intelligence (AI) and deep learning for anomaly detection and thereby increase the security of biometric systems against fraud?  Biometrics and eID Solutions by secunet: make any application modular and highly secure are always of high quality "made in Germany" guarantee low total cost of ownership are consistantly standard-compliant, hence flexible in use and globally interoperable always contain the latest insights from standardisation bodies. Secure IT-Infrastructure IT security is the backbone of every modern society. Anyone who does not know if their data and IT systems are adequately protected is playing a risky game. Secure IT infrastructures and workplaces, sophisticated security concepts, and clear-cut emergency plans are now vital prerequisites for all organisations, whether local or global. As a result, the IT security market is as varied and dynamic as its challenges. Over the last two decades, secunet has emerged as an innovative market leader in Germany and Europe, offering trusted, high-quality solutions and products in fields like applied cryptography, e-Government, business security and automotive security, all of which are designed to meet the complex challenges of today and tomorrow. Our services range from analysis and consulting, to the conception, development and integration of software and hardware solutions, as well as training and support. Protection against Cyberattacks Modern technological developments and diverse aspects of digitization - such as connected vehicles, smart metering, remote control of building services, Industry 4.0, global financial transactions, artificial intelligence - provide a platform for industrial espionage and sabotage. Today, cyberattacks target in particular Critical Infrastructure Operators as well as organizations with sovereign functions, which must ensure the internal security and the defense of a country and protect the identities and rights of citizens. In relation to its numerous national and international customers, secunet relies on long-term partnerships. The security partnership with the Federal Republic of Germany since 2004 underlines this impressively. The Divisions: Public Authorities, Defense, Homeland Security, Critical Infrastructures, Automotive. The secunet Public Procurement Division supports and advises state, federal and EU organizations, using state-of-the-art products and services as well as individual security solutions that can be combined as needed. These meet the requirements of a modern administration, enable the fulfillment of sovereign tasks and comply with the security requirements for the protection of classified Information as well as other legal requirements. The armed forces, military authorities and organisations have a particularly strong need to protect the confidentiality of their data. Their spectrum ranges from national and international to mission-related classified data. Intelligent IT security architectures are crucial for efficient, needs-based provision and processing of this data. This applies in particular to the basic IT-based troop operations, military command information systems, vehicle and on-board networks as well as multinational mission networks with mobile tactical system components. Based on longterm well-established domain knowledge and experiences in customer-specific requirements, the Defence Division of secunet supports military customers - focusing on encryption and cyber security - conceptual and with system integration, as well as with application-based research & development services. The Division Homeland Security is specialized in meeting the needs of the organizations and relevant ministries involved in this context, delivering tailor-made, holistic and intelligent IT security solutions - nationally and internationally. These include high-performance products, customer-specific developments and highly specialized consulting. It focuses on solutions and infrastructures for capturing biometric data, stationary, mobile and automated border control, modern (mobile) administrative workstations, advanced document management systems for processing classified information, and secure and high-performance police records. Critical infrastructures are organisations and institutions that are crucial to our society. These infrastructures are increasingly reliant on IT-supported systems and require special protection, because malfunction and disruption can have dramatic consequences for the German and European economies and society at large. It is therefore vitally important to protect CRITIS from cyber attacks, espionage and sabotage. What s more, the division s extensive consulting and product portfolio allows customers to prevent and counteract malfunctions and security breaches - while meeting all applicable legal requirements and industry standards. The automotive industry wants solutions suitable for series production that respond to vehicle-specific needs, as well as to the peculiarities of the entire automotive supply chain. With years of experience in the automotive industry, secunet s Automotive division works with vehicle manufacturers and suppliers to develop and implement production-ready IT security for on-board network components - guaranteeing secure internal and external vehicle networking and protecting new mobility services. The automotive industry wants solutions suitable for series production that respond to vehicle-specific needs, as well as to the peculiarities of the entire automotive supply chain. The Company: Always one step ahead At secunet, more than 500 experts focus on topics such as cryptography (SINA), e-government, business security and automotive security with the aim of always staying one step ahead of the competition in terms of quality and technology. Our services range from analysis to consulting, conception, development and integration of software and hardware solutions to training and support. In relation to our numerous national and international customers, secunet relies on long-term partnerships. The security partnership with the Federal Republic of Germany since 2004 underlines this impressively. IT Security Partner of the Federal Republic of Germany The IT security market is as varied and dynamic as its challenges. Over the last two decades, secunet has emerged as an innovative market leader in Germany and Europe, offering trusted, high-quality solutions and products in fields like applied cryptography, e-Government, business security and automotive security, all of which are designed to meet the complex challenges of today and tomorrow. secunet Group The secunet Security Networks AG consists of the divisions Automotive, Homeland Security, Critical Infrastructures, Public Authorities and Defence. The international SINA sales operations are handled by secunet International GmbH & Co. KG. All roles that support the operational units of secunet Security Networks AG are handled by secunet Service GmbH. secunet AG is listed in the Prime Standard of Deutsche B√∂rse. Main shareholder is Giesecke & Devrient GmbH. Mission Statement of secunet: secunet is the largest specialist provider of IT security solutions in Germany. With our efficient products and tailor-made solutions, we are making a vital contribution to greater security in the digital world. The long-standing IT security partnership with the Federal Republic of Germany proves this impressively. With the consistent development and production at eleven locations in Germany, we meet the requirement to provide our customers with high-quality and technologically leading products and solutions. secunet s employees are recognised experts and have a profound understanding of cryptographic processes as well as their practical application. Paired with our corporate culture of openness and lateral thinking, this expertise enables us to break new ground in IT security and develop creative solutions for our customers and the wider market. secunet therefore regularly sets new standards and plays a significant role in the development of future security technologies for particularly sensitive information. secunet can draw on over twenty years of experience of working on diverse projects in the field of IT security. Our strength is our high level of technological competence coupled with extensive experience in providing IT security solutions. Customers rely on secunet for specialist knowledge and expertise as well as high-efficient products and solutions. We take our subsequent responsibilities very seriously, because the security of the data and infrastructures entrusted to us is our main priority. The digital world transcends national borders, so IT security is a global challenge and a global responsibility. We therefore also put our knowledge and expertise internationally at the disposal of  our customers. A relationship based on partnership with our customers is the basis for the high level of customer satisfaction. This is reflected in long-term business relationships - we have been accompanying numerous authorities and companies for over 20 years in matters of IT security. Our quality management we constantly adapt to changing circumstances. Based on our mission statement, we derive corporate goals and from them the objectives of our processes. Managers and their employees are thus motivated and supported to take responsibility for achieving their goals and to identify with our core values. We commit to taking due account of the needs of internal and external stakeholders. Official and legal requirements will be met at any time. We see it as a duty and a challenge to question the existing and to make good things even better. In this way we want to continuously increase the quality and competitiveness of our products and services. SECURE NETWORKS Automotive Security Industrial Security & IoT Encryption Systems PKI:Public-Key-Infrastructures Protection of Critical Infrastructures (CRITIS) Secure Web Solutions Secure Internet Access SINA SECURITY MANAGEMENT & CERTIFICATIONS Awareness Campaigns Data Protection Management Information Security Management Managed Security Service Test Lab for IT-Conformity Security Analysis and Penetration Tests Security Consulting SECURE AUTHENTICATION Biometrics eIDAS Solutions Electronic Signatures Authentication STATE SECURITY AND TASKS OF PUBLIC AUTHORITIES Border Control Entry/Exit System Identity Check and Verification Electronic Identity Documents CI-Registry and Collaboration. AREAS Automotive Authorities Banking, Insurance and Financial Services Health IT and ITC Security Organisations Logistics Supplier Defence. Security Organisations: High-Performance Products and Highly Specialised Expertise for a Free, Safe and Secure Society Public authorities and organisations tasked with ensuring safety & security put extremely high standards on their IT and communication infrastructures. The capturing of data must be of high quality, while processing and transmission must be handled confidentially and securely. And it is also essential for data and information to be made available quickly and flexibly. Regardless of when and where ‚Äì security organisations must be able to depend on their IT and communication systems around the clock. secunet is familiar with these specific requirements security organisations have to face. The Homeland Security division offers customised, holistic and intelligent IT security solutions on a national and international scale. These include high-performance products, customer-specific developments and highly specialised advice, focusing on solutions and infrastructures for high quality detection and processing of biometric data stationary, mobile and automated border control checks highly secure stationary and mobile workstations mobile identification methods used in modern police work accomplishing more secure police networks with better performance digital, cross-agency collaboration on classified documents and sensitive data Key clients in Germany include almost all major federal and state security agencies, specifically the Federal Police and the Federal Office for Information Security. Government authorities of other EU states such as the Czech Republic, Norway, Iceland and Austria as well as international organisations also rely on the state-of-the-art and highly secure solutions that secunet develops. Authentication: Secure Authentication - Essential in the Digital World Secure authentication is essential in the digital world. Applications, systems and infrastructures require proof that the person interacting with them is actually who they say they are. Hence administering users, identities and their authentication attributes is a subject of increasing significance in the electronic world. Border Control: For Secure, Efficient and Future-Proof Air, Land and Sea Borders Modern border control systems, innovative technologies, such as biometrics "on the move", and large-scale inter-connected information systems have paved the way for fully automated border control: Thanks to nearly complete process transparency and simplification as well as intuitive user guidance concepts, travellers already pass through the border control process independently and with minimal interaction. The growing amount of passenger numbers and increasingly complex security requirements for border control systems remain to be a challenge for efficient and comfortable processing of travellers. New technologies and processes must be implemented in border control and passenger clearance systems while complying with regulations and considering specific requirements for the use at air, land and sea borders. secunet s experts are already actively working on even better border control solutions fit for the future: The Smart Borders initiative of the EU, for example, has the objective of increasing the security on the outer border of the EU and making the border control processes more efficient. To this end, new border control systems will be introduced across Europe until the year 2022: The Entry/Exit System, EES for short, will centrally register and store arrivals and departures of non-EU citizens while the European Travel Information and Authorisation System (ETIAS) will check travellers from third countries even before they cross the European Border. Supporting our customers through comprehensive consulting services regarding the necessary adaptations to their border control processes and systems in compliance with legal provisions, for example in terms of data protection, and technical requirements for Smart Borders 2020 is only one of secunet s contributions to secure, efficient and future-proof border control at land, air and sea borders. EES-ready. Easy with us. Secure Borders with secunet border gears secunet border gears is a comprehensive product portfolio that enables the implementation of sustainable, EES-compliant border control strategies that take all parties into account: All components can be integrated individually into existing infrastructures or combined together to form a modular, modern and future-proof border control implementation with secunet border gears infrastructure. secunet border gears stands for maximum security, convenient and intuitive passenger processes, and for "EES-ready" border control technologies. All secunet solutions make border control systems highly secure, modular and customisable are continuously developed further and of consistently high quality "Made in Germany" guarantee a low total cost of ownership are always standard-compliant and thus both flexible in use and globally interoperable.

text: AS A VISION OF: FROM IDEA TO PRODUCT, PRODUCT TO BUSINESS MODEL. WE BRING INNOVATION TO ART, TECHNOLOGY TO LIFE. SELFMETRIC: FUTURE OF THE WORLD. Ideas were not enough! text: Vision and mission. AI for a Better Tomorrow. SenseTime aims to develop AI technologies that advance the world s economies, society and humanity for a better tomorrow. Smart city, mobile, general cultural and entertainment, intelligent automobile, smart health, intelligent business and finance, education, advertising. Stay carefree with AI. AI technology propels industry upgrade. Technical Capabilities: Based on the foundation of proprietary technologies and a core "brain" built on a deep learning platform, SenseTime has rapidly opened up AI application in multiple vertical scenarios. SenseTime Research has cooperated with dozens of top universities and research institutions internationally. SenseTime is a global company focused on developing innovative AI technologies that positively contribute to economies, society and humanity. We have offices in mainland China, Hong Kong, Japan, Singapore, Saudi Arabia and United Arab Emirates. For more information, please visit SenseTime s LinkedIn, Twitter and Facebook pages.

text: "Core Technology": MACHINE VISION Sensingtech machine vision technology can be widely used in AI policing, industrial robots, AI medical, AI information analysis and other fields. Sensingtech face recognition technology mainly works on the basis of facial features of human to detect if there is any human face in image or video detection. If there is a human face area, this technology can be used to further detect, among other information, its position, size and face organ positions. Based on aforesaid information, it will obtain features of each face representing identity and make contrast between aforesaid features and existing face data set to determine the identity of the human face. FEATURE ALGORITHM Sensingtech dynamic face recognition algorithm can accurately identify more than 50 facial features, gender, age, expression, whether wearing glasses, beard and so on..Sensingtech face recognition algorithm adopts multi-angle face detection and positioning. The system has the face recognition and authentication capacity at a level of over 99%, with the recognition speed of 1s to 2s. On occasions of flow density and appearance of multiple human faces in an image, the system will make rapid dynamic detection and positioning of human faces of objects that are moving and not controlled. DEEP LEARNING Sensingtech face recognition technology, maintaining international advanced status, in the international authoritative evaluation of video retrieval TRECVID evaluation for the first time in two consecutive years. Deep learning model is recognized as the most advanced face recognition algorithm worldwide. Sensingtech dynamic face recognition technology works on the basis of convolutional neural network s deep monitoring and learning model and million-level face data set. With high system recognition rate and response rate, Sensingtech keeps the leading position worldwide in face recognition technology. It has been rated as no.1 for two consecutive years in TRECVID (TREC Video Retrieval Evaluation) evaluation. "Application area": Intelligent Security China has a large population and high population mobility. Therefore, the public security against terrorism is heavy and pressingly in need. Face recognition technology that is characterized by high precision capture/contrast function can be recognized as a big technical leak forward in public security. Sensing dynamic face recognition system provides technical support in face detection for public security organs - intelligent recognition analysis service of face enables faster and more convenient case investigation and security protection & control, which not only greatly improves the business efficiency of case handling, but also lowers personnel and time costs of case solving. It is also a supplement to security prevention and control system. Intelligent Finance Since there are increasingly higher requirements of people on the safety, banks and other financial institutions start to attach more and more importance to face recognition technology and in financial applications, face recognition is becoming more frequently used. In varied financial business requiring user identity authentication, there is a pressing need of the participation of the face recognition technology, which can not only save the costs of manual check, but also guarantee higher accuracy in comparison with manual check. In financial applications, for example remote account opening, identity verification, account login, face based payment and VIP customer management, Sensingtech face recognition technology is able to improve banking safety prevention level, workers  business efficiency and customer service quality. Intelligent Building Sensingtech intelligent building management system supports face based registration, batched personnel registration, door opening by face detection and second-level pass; it can recognize the identity of personnel in real time and automatically generate powerful attendance statements; personnel will not need to take a card to open the door by card sweeping; this puts an end to loss and forged use of card. It supports time-based visitor authority allocation, simplifies visitor registration procedure and improves visitor registration efficiency. As an upgraded product of common management systems including card reader and fingerprint identification system, face recognition based intelligent building management system can effectively improve enterprises  management efficiency and office area safety. Smart Transportation. Smart Healthcare. Smart Community. Open a new epoch of artificial intelligence. About Us. Beijing Sensing Technology, a hi-tech innovative company dedicating to artificial intelligence, integrates development, production and sale in business. Always striving to make a breakthrough in face recognition technology, the Company aims to build customized industry solutions of artificial intelligence and mega data analysis. Supported by academic resources of Tsinghua University and Beihang University and with talent and technology as the core, deep learning based face recognition technology leads the industry and can be taken advantage of to develop intelligent and comprehensive solutions in intelligent security and safety, intelligent finance, intelligent building, intelligent transportation, intelligent medicine and intelligent community, in order to offer competitive artificial intelligent solutions and services for customers.

Bringing Artificial Intelligence to the Edge. Embedded AI through Deep Learning: Voice, Vision, Biometrics & Natural Language. Biometric authentication that s fast, convenient, and accurate. Sensory s TrulyNatural speech recognition and natural language understanding platform. Shown here as customized for small applicances. FEATURED PRODUCTS: TrulyHandsfree Voice Control Software that makes devices and applications come alive without pushing a button, TrulySecure Authentication A software solution that combines voice and vision authentication. About Sensory: Sensory, Inc. is a profitable, venture backed, privately held software company focused on improving the user experience through embedded machine learning technologies such as voice, vision, and natural language processing. Sensory was founded in 1994 and pioneered neural network approaches for embedded speech recognition in consumer electronics.  Sensory s technology codebase is well engineered and highly efficient from close to one thousand people-years of code development. Sensory s technologies have shipped in over 2 billion products from hundreds of leading consumer electronics manufacturers including ATT, Hasbro, Huawei, Google, JVC, Kenwood, LG, Mattel, Motorola, Plantronics, Samsung, Sony, SEGA, Uniden, and V-Tech. Sensory has over 35 issued patents covering speech recognition in consumer electronics, biometric authentication, sensor/speech combinations, wake up word technology, speech recognition on DSP s, client/cloud use of speech technologies and more. Sensory s TrulyHandsfree‚Ñ¢ Voice Control technology has revolutionized the speech technology industry by removing the need to hit buttons to activate speech recognition. This technology is getting rave editorial and customer reviews for enabling a safer and more convenient user experience with an extremely noise robust and accurate solution that responds quickly and at ultra-low power consumption. Variations include fixed phrase triggers and command sets, user defined triggers, predefined fixed phrase voice passwords, user defined passwords, and small vocabulary speech recognition command sets. TrulyHandsfree runs on more platforms including DSPs, microcontrollers, sensor hubs, smart mics, and operating systems than any other speech recognition company in the world. Almost as many platforms as all other speech companies combined!! TrulyHandsfree is perfect for low power embedded applications for wake up word, wearables, and Bluetooth‚Ñ¢ devices. Sensory s TrulyNatural‚Ñ¢ technology is a state-of-the-art deep neural net speech engine implementing a custom embedded architecture allowing developers to incorporate scalable sizes and capabilities ranging from small footprint small vocabulary engines to large vocabulary continuous speech recognition systems. TrulyNatural is perfect for automotive, IoT, mobile, and other home electronic applications requiring a more natural language and flexible voice input than traditional grammar based approaches. TrulySecure‚Ñ¢ combines Sensory s award winning speaker verification with face authentication to enable a fast, convenient and accurate approach to biometric authentication. Sensory s Applock in the GooglePlay store is the highest rated biometric application, has had over 100,000 downloads and produces several terabytes of real world usable data every month. TrulySecure is now used by some of the biggest banks and largest mobile providers in the world. Sensory is headquartered in Santa Clara, CA, and has offices in Portland, OR, Boulder, CO, Tokyo, Seoul and Hong Kong. Technologies: Sensory offers world class speech and vision technologies that can be embedded into mobile and other consumer electronic products. The technologies listed below can be implemented across a variety of operating systems and digital signal processors (DSP). Small vocabulary command and control. Multi-biometric authentication. Embedded large vocabulary continuous speech recognition. Embedded Software & SDKs. Applications: Sensory develops consumer applications with its in house technologies to better provide functional solutions to its technology licensees, and to get consumer feedback and data to improve its technologies and designs. Many of the applications will use multiple Sensory technologies. Platforms include Android as well as some chip based platforms for the ultimate in small footprint and power savings. Markets: Sensory s embedded software technologies are applicable to any markets that require embedded or PC based speech recognition and biometric solutions. Sensory s focus is on the consumer area, and has worked with hundreds of leading consumer OEM s to put speech user interfaces into a variety of consumer and other key market segments. Wearables and Bluetooth, Mobile, Tablet and PC, Consumer and Home Electronics, Industrial, Medical and Enterprise, Automotive, Entertainment / Toys.

Analyze faces while protecting people s identity. Features Why Sightcorp Technologies? Sightcorp develops patented proprietary AI Software solutions. Through computer vision, deep learning and machine learning, our technology can analyze faces in images, videos, and in real-life environments. Simple to use, Easy to integrate, Plug & play, Affordable. About Us. Sightcorp is an AI spin-off from the University of Amsterdam (UvA), specializing in easy-to-use face analysis and face recognition software. We transform computer vision and deep learning research into commercial solutions that give our customers accurate, real and actionable insights into their audiences. Our audience analytics software can anonymously analyze faces in images, videos, and real-life environments, while our face recognition software assists globally in accurately verifying identities and authenticating users in fields such as Access Control, KYC, and Payment Verification. Developed In-house All our technology is developed in-house by our experienced team of deep learning and computer vision engineers. No. 1 Face Analysis Solution for Accurate Anonymized Data Aggregation Our face analysis technology is a global top performer in real-time video analytics and audience measurement designed for digital signage (DOOH) and retail analytics insights. Our leading technology is highly accurate, can run on affordable hardware, and provides high flexibility by working offline and on all major platforms so any developer can integrate face analysis into new applications with ease. Ready integrations are also available. Best-in-Class Deep Learning Based Face Recognition Technology Our state-of-the-art, most affordable face recognition technology is 100% deep learning-based and performs best in class with regards to accuracy. It enables our customers to identify faces and verify and authenticate identities across all ethnicities with confidence. Privacy We value people s privacy and take privacy very seriously. Therefore, we have employed a Data Protection Officer (DPO) to provide us with independent, expert advice on complying with our data protection obligations and implementing our data protection policies. Privacy is at the forefront of our development work, and for this reason, all our Face Analysis Technology comes with privacy by default in the form of automatically blurring all faces captured in video streams. We ve also incorporated privacy by design by ensuring that image processing takes place on device (locally) and that the client is the sole controller and owner of the data. Sightcorp does not have direct or remote access to any of the devices running the software. Powered By Knowledge Our HQ is based in the scientific hub of Amsterdam, where our dedicated team works on developing state-of-the-art AI software solutions. Sightcorp s proprietary software relies on a solid scientific foundation of more than 15 years of R&D research. Thanks to our connection with the UvA, and to our amazing team with high expertise in Deep Learning and Computer Vision, we make sure to be always at the forefront of the latest developments and scientific innovations. Our software helps our diversified client base active across the world to continuously meet their core goals.

text: Blockchain is changing the way the air transport industry operates and collaborates. At the heart of the air transport community. 100% dedicated and committed to the air transport industry. Featured solutions: Our solutions drive operational efficiencies at more than 1,000 airports while delivering the promise of the connected aircraft to more than 400 airlines on 17,000 aircraft globally. Airport Management Whether you re an airline, airport or ground handler, Airport Management can help you streamline existing systems, reduce costs and centralize your operations. SITA Connect With access to the largest IP network coverage in the air transport industry, SITA Connect offers fast setup for capacity adjustments and increased security for remote offices. Global services More than ever before, the air transport industry needs reliable IT services. That s why SITA Global Services offer on-demand infrastructure that maximizes IT uptime and minimizes disruption. Who we are: Around the world, nearly every passenger flight relies on SITA technology. Globally, almost every airport and airline does business with us, and it s our job to support their operations. As the world s leading air transport IT and communications specialist, we re committed to meeting the demands of the air transport industry around the clock, every day. Our members and customers Airlines, airports, aircraft, ground handlers, governments, air cargo, aerospace, air navigation service providers and international organizations all use our information and communication technology (ICT) solutions, relying on SITA s expertise to enable  easy air travel every step of the way . Owned by the industry, we re guided by around 400 air transport owner-members around the world. And we re steered by the expertise and experience of the SITA Board and SITA Council, comprising over 35 air transport industry CIOs and other IT professionals. Our value to the community Transforming air travel through technology is central to SITA s business. Thanks to SITA s unique governance and membership structure, our strategic direction, developments and collaborative innovations are driven directly by the air transport community and its requirements. With a remit that has always involved working for air transport, we tackle community issues with common approaches and shared services, with a focus on reducing costs, increasing efficiencies and introducing new ways of working. Our portfolios We know that our customers need a business partner that keeps things simple - who provides more joined-up, connected, integrated solutions, services and systems. Combined, our three domains of expertise, SITA AT AIRPORTS, SITA FOR AIRCRAFT and SITA AT BORDERS, address almost every core business, operational and passenger process in our industry. SITA provides one of the broadest portfolios of innovative technology solutions, services and infrastructure through a single supplier, underpinned by our deep knowledge of the industry, its stakeholders and processes. Our portfolio is built with knowledge and expertise obtained through constant collaboration with members, customers, partners and industry bodies ‚Äì to determine and satisfy the air travel industry s requirements. We are focusing on making air travel more connected, smarter and more efficient, significantly contributing to the sustainability of our industry. Our global and local presence As one of the most internationally diverse companies, we serve over 200 countries and territories and speak over 60 different languages. Our strong local presence - with offices spanning the globe - means our service staff are on the ground and always on hand to lend their support. Corporate social responsibility: Acting responsibly is at the heart of all we do at SITA. We believe that corporate social responsibility can make a positive difference for everyone ‚Äì our employees, our business, our customers and the air transport industry. Our focus: Education, Environment, Engagement.  At SITA, our focus on corporate social responsibility has three key aims, to reduce our environmental impact around the world, to support the communities where we operate, and to communicate progress around our commitments. Our impact: 83,000 youth positively impacted across five African countries by the SITA Air Transport Community Foundation.  We aim to bring ICT and education to young people while enabling teachers and schools in Ethiopia, South Africa, Uganda, Zambia and Zimbabwe. A Sustainable Future. Encouraging Engineers. A Balancing Act. Working for the community: As an industry-owned organization, SITA understands the importance of delivering products and services that are highly valued by the air transport industry. With more than 400 members and 2,000 customers around the globe, we are driven to provide the air transport community with solutions that solve the industry s biggest challenges, foster innovation and improve profitability. We aim to to explore new technologies with potential benefit to the entire community. We also ensure that IT systems work together through shared infrastructure and cost-effective use of technologies. And working with a wide range of air transport associations in global and regional forum, we aim to deliver common approaches and set new standard that help the industry as a whole become more efficient. Solutions & services: Global business solutions for air transport and related industries. Air navigation providers Airlines Airports Governments Ground handlers. Governments Discover SITA know-how for governments. Automation at the border With passenger numbers increasing governments are turning more and more towards automation to help ease the congestion at border points. Explore how  developments in border automation are paving the way for automating even more control functions at the border. Automation at the border With passenger numbers increasing governments are turning more and more towards automation to help ease the congestion at border points. Explore how  developments in border automation are paving the way for automating even more control functions at the border. READ MORE Shorter queues, greater passenger satisfaction Biometric facial technology used for Id management at Hamad International Airport is set to provide a fast, efficient, hassle-free passengers journey that virtually eliminates queues. READ MORE Shorter queues, greater passenger satisfaction Biometric facial technology used for Id management at Hamad International Airport is set to provide a fast, efficient, hassle-free passengers journey that virtually eliminates queues. WATCH THE VIDEO Secure identity and data management This latest blog explores Self-Sovereign Identity as a potential solution to the digital identity challenge, identity data management and data security. SITA helps governments worldwide keep their borders secure. We provide a complete set of capabilities to modernize border security. With SITA s solutions, government agencies have the right information at the right time in the right place to make informed decisions. Our automated border solution optimizes the processing of travelers without compromising security. SITA Smart Path‚Ñ¢ The whole-journey identity management solution: Great travel experiences start with SITA Smart Path‚Ñ¢. It s the ATI s most comprehensive whole-journey identity management solution where your face is your boarding pass. At airports worldwide, SITA provides self-service and agent-assisted passenger processing solutions at every step of the journey from check-in to boarding. Passengers can easily validate their identity with just a quick scan of their face. They can then travel along the entire passenger journey without having to show their passport or boarding pass. Using digital biometric ID management technology, SITA Smart Path‚Ñ¢ automates the entire travel journey, from secure check-in to prompt boarding. It s easily integrated into your existing common use airport infrastructure and airline systems ‚Äì providing a seamless, secure and cost-effective customer experience. SITA Smart Path‚Ñ¢ can be integrated with: Industry-standard common use systems CUSS check-in kiosks & CUTE check-in desks Bag drop units Gates for secure access Boarding Automated border control To comply with GDPR regulations, SITA Smart Path‚Ñ¢ also integrates with government systems and databases to allow for immigration and border checks. The plug and play modular structure is easy to incorporate into your existing systems. You ll be able to quickly facilitate faster passenger throughput and reduce queues at security and passport checkpoints. Did you know? 41% of airports expect to invest in ID management solutions by 2021 (Source: 2018 Air Transport IT Insights, SITA) 92% of passengers would consider using biometrics instead of a passport or a boarding pass (Source: SITA 2017 Passenger IT Trends Survey). Smart Path‚Ñ¢ helps improve security oversight, speed up passenger processing and reduce resources needed to manage the passenger journey. This enhances the passenger experience by providing them with more choice and control of their journey. SITA is the world s leading air transport and communications specialist. No other supplier has our global reach or our years of experience, and our products and services are second to none. SITA Smart Path‚Ñ¢ is quick and simple to integrate into existing airline systems. It brings a new level of security to airlines, airports and governments by reducing queues and providing simple, fast self-service identity verification. The automated boarding process and pre-processing systems help facilitate interactions with travelers during the passenger journey while minimizing security risks. It provides a comprehensive whole-journey self-service travel experience, seamlessly integrating with existing infrastructure. This reduces operational costs and helps deliver faster passenger throughput. SITA combines global reach with capability and industry expertise in airports, airlines, governments and biometrics. This creates a secure, collaborative platform that ensures real-time intelligence and greater accuracy of passenger data. All this facilitates the quick transfer of legitimate passengers across borders. iBorders¬Æ Advanced Solutions Tailored solution to keep your borders safe. iBorders Advanced Solutions gives you everything you need to transform border security and facilitate the travel experience. It does this through: Information Intelligence Optimized traveler interactions Comprehensive insights to improve border operations This product makes sure your agencies always have the right information when they need it, helping them make better-informed decisions. By targeting resources at higher-risk travelers (passengers and crew), it "exports the border". This lets you deny travel to inadmissible persons and those posing a threat, while quickly processing low-risk travelers. iBorders Advanced Solutions lets you transform border operations and improve your traveler experience. It enables you to: Ensure efficient and effective border security - Identify high-risk travelers and reduce document and identity fraud Lower the cost of dealing with unwanted and inadmissible persons ‚Äì Prevent them from arriving at the border Improve efficiency and speed of processing low-risk travelers ‚Äì Let skilled immigration officers focus on high-risk travelers Have complete situational awareness of your borders ‚Äì  Combines all available information from multiple agencies, giving you real-time insights into your border operation Ensure efficient and risk-based resource allocation ‚Äì Using reporting and performance analysis tools iBorders enhances every aspect of border operations, through four core capabilities: Information ‚Äì acquires, collates and transforms vast amounts of comprehensive traveler information from airlines and other carriers, as well as integration with external data sources such as government databases Intelligence - powerful risk assessment tools combined with travel document and identity verification transform traveler data into actionable intelligence Interaction - pre-clearance for passengers in advance, secure risk-assessed self-service border clearance for travelers holding biometric travel documents Insight - comprehensive metrics on border performance combined with predictive analytics to enable risk-based allocation of resources and management of border operations. iBorders¬Æ IdentityAssurance Biometric systems for identity verification: Risk assessment at the border is only as effective as your ability to ensure that the people you have assessed are who they say they are. SITA s iBorders¬Æ IdentityAssurance uses biometric and biographic data to identify travelers quickly and accurately. Using centralized identity management, automated identity-matching and resolution, and an identity workbench that reviews suspect identities and conflicts, iBorders IdentityAssurance gives you certainty that travelers are who they say they are. 300% One government improved detection of duplicate entries using iBorders IdentityAssurance. iBorders IdentityAssurance consolidates biographic and biometric data from different origins, to provide certainty about the identity of each traveler. It includes detection of counterfeit documents and travelers claiming multiple identities. Automated matching of biometric and biographic data links each traveler back to a single physical person, with manual confirmation of an individual s identity when conflicts arise. Biometric data can be incorporated from multiple sources, including passport and visa issuance and other points where the traveler interacts with border authorities. This person-centric approach ensures a consistent view of traveler identities across the border operation. Features Centralized and scalable, person-centric management of identities Supports the entire border operation, including passport and visa issuance, the primary immigration line and all other points of interaction Workbench tools that allow border management agents to resolve identity conflicts Tracks fraudulent and multiple identities detection for subsequent investigation Compatibility with the industry-leading algorithms and matching sub-systems for face, fingerprint and iris biometric data End-to-end solution iBorders IdentityAssurance is part of SITA s iBorders¬Æ Border Management solution, offering the most complete set of border management capabilities available anywhere. The range of functionality offered and our proven history of deploying border control systems makes SITA unique ‚Äì we are the only provider able to deliver seamless convergence of biographic and biometric passenger data processing with risk assessment and identity assurance. Innovation Innovation is one of the key drivers of our business. It s at the heart of everything we do. At SITA, our innovation focus is on collaboratively developing technology solutions and services for the air transport industry. WE INVEST 7% OF REVENUE IN R&D. We innovate. Together 0Working with 20 industry bodies to set standards 040 staff participating in 55 working groups 0Backed by our partner Orange Business Services 08 patent applications to date owing to the SITA Lab s work, including SITA s first ever US patent 01st to provide exit check using your face as a passport 01st autonomous self-propelling baggage robot 01st autonomous check-in kiosk. Identity management of the future. Identity management is another key challenge for the industry and an important initiative for SITA, not only in terms of providing increased security but streamlining the immigration process globally. Leveraging SITA s existing self-service technology together with the use of mobile and biometrics technologies, SITA Lab is working with governments, airlines and airports to speed up identity checks for passengers. This is a new world where your face will be your passport. Boarding with a picture. This user-friendly, biometric, self-boarding program is designed to deliver a secure and seamless passenger experience. Checks are sent quickly to the airline s systems. SITA, together with JetBlue and the US Customs and Border Protection (CBP) have tested a new paperless and deviceless self-boarding process as part of ongoing trials to implement a biometric exit process in the future. JetBlue will be the first airline to integrate with CBP to use biometrics and facial recognition technology to verify customers at the gate during boarding. Customers who opt in during the boarding process can put away their boarding passes and devices and simply step up to the camera for a quick photo. The custom-designed camera station will connect to CBP to instantly match the image to passport, visa or immigration photos in the CBP database and verify flight details. The customer will be notified on an integrated screen above the camera when they are cleared to proceed to board. This biometric self-boarding program is designed to be easy to use. What we want to deliver is a secure and seamless passenger experience. We use technology to enable biometric checks and for CBP authorization to be sent quickly to the airline s systems. This is the first integration of biometric authorization by the CBP with an airline and may prove to be a solution that will be quick and easy to roll out across all US airports.
